modName: Mirage - RaceMenu Preset and UUNP Bodyslide - DELETED
summary: Mirage is a RaceMenu preset that comes with an optional UUNP BodySlide, with whom I consider a forest goblin.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/X644UFl.jpg[/img][/center][center]"Mirage was born from the breath of Kyne close to Strid River in Valenwood; where vines wither and a waterfall flows into a lost ravine. She was to be watched over until the day came where her destiny would unfold. Many years later, naked and unconscious, she was found below the Shrine of Akatosh by two hunters and brought to Falkreath, where she woke and walked, at the same hour the World Eater took flight on the wave of time once again."




[color=#b6d7a8][b][img]https://i.imgur.com/VUFBZkq.jpg[/img]﻿
- Download Mirage Installers -[/b][/color]
• Mirage RaceMenu Preset

• Mirage Plump BodySlide Preset (UUNP)
[i]or[/i]
• Mirage Plump BodySlide Preset (Less Perky Nips) (UUNP)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#b6d7a8][b]- Mods Required For Preset Compatibility -[/b][/color]
• [Install]: DIMONIZED UNP female body﻿ (or variant).

• [Install]: Fair Skin Complexion (UNP)
[i]* I use Optimized, but the other UNP one should be fine.
* Use all assets that come with the main file: body textures, brows, eyes, etc.[/i]

• [Install]: SG Female Textures Renewal, plus Options (install after main file).
[i]* UNP Textures (Main File) -> 2K/4k No Scar Textures -> Smooth Body Textures[/i]

• [Install]: KS Hairdos Renewal
• [Install]: The Eyes Of Beauty
• [Install]: Brows
• [Install]: Ravens Warpaint (Standalone 11-13)
• [Install]: The Coenaculi

• [Install]: Freckle Mania
[i]* First version. Could probably use version two.[/i]

• Set up Mirage Plump in BodySlider before clicking the play button, if you want to use it.
[i]* I do recommend it, as I made it to go with her RaceMenu preset.[/i]

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#b6d7a8][b]- In-Game -[/b][/color]
• Set your character's race to Breton.
• Load up the Mirage RaceMenu preset.




[img]https://i.imgur.com/IH7kKUX.jpg[/img]﻿
Bethesda
NexusMods

[color=#b6d7a8][b]- Inspiration -[/b][/color]
I was inspired by the World of Warcraft [url=https://wow.gamepedia.com/Goblin_(playable)]female goblins[/url],
well as [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85644/]Of Goblins and Men[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13953660]shidoni1[/url].

[img]https://i.imgur.com/mcgnIKF.jpg[/img]﻿
• Permission is given to use my Mirage RaceMenu preset and Mirage Plump BodySlide for your personal appearance only, well as any screenshots taken of Mirage by me, posted on this page. If you would like to use the Mirage Plump BodySlide for a follower of yours, then all I ask is to credit me and everything will be fine from there. You don't have to ask me to use it. However, don't upload the Mirage Plump BodySlide with your follower installation.

• Do not create a follower mod of Mirage and upload it to the NexusMods or a third party website. If I feel that a follower is to be of her, then I'll post it on NexusMods myself, and only here, going through the correct channels to gain permission of said asset creators.

• Uploading the Mirage Preset and Plump BodySlide to other avenues is prohibited, well as trying to make any sort of income from it. The Mirage Preset and Mirage Plump BodySlide will only exist on NexusMods, Forever Free, as it should be.

• Any imagery with text on it (e.g. banners), shown in the header and on this description page, aren't to be used for your own work — its for this mod page only.[/center]
author: avamods
